paragraphs.text: C00lkidd was created by a player named 007n7.
When c00lkidd attacked a game, the song "Never Gonna Give You Up" played.

paragraphs.ex: The song was "Spooky Scary Skeletons", not a Rick Roll!

paragraphs.text: In Forsaken lore, c00lkidd is 10 years old.

paragraphs.ex: He is the only child killer in the game.
It was called c00lgui â€” with zeros, not O's!

paragraphs.text: C00lkidd thinks he is playing tag when he hunts survivors.

paragraphs.ex: The Spectre manipulates him. He says "Tag! You're it!"

paragraphs.text: C00lkidd has the highest health of all killers.

paragraphs.ex: He has the LOWEST health â€” only 800 HP!

paragraphs.text: When c00lkidd kills 007n7, he gently lays him on the ground.

paragraphs.ex: 007n7 is his father in the lore. Special animation!
